name: bj-consensus
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wb(wo(wif(w0, w1, w2), wa(w1, w2)), wif(w0, w1, w2))

stmt.origin: impbii(wo(wif(w0, w1, w2), wa(w1, w2)), wif(w0, w1, w2))
stmt.pretty: impbii((if(w0, w1, w2)∨(w1 ∧ w2)), if(w0, w1, w2))

body.origin:
|- wb(wo(wif(w0, w1, w2), wa(w1, w2)), wif(w0, w1, w2))
-| wi(wo(wif(w0, w1, w2), wa(w1, w2)), wif(w0, w1, w2))
-| wi(wif(w0, w1, w2), wo(wif(w0, w1, w2), wa(w1, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wo(wif(w0, w1, w2), wa(w1, w2)), wif(w0, w1, w2))
-| wi(wo(wif(w0, w1, w2), wa(w1, w2)), wif(w0, w1, w2))
-| wi(wif(w0, w1, w2), wo(wif(w0, w1, w2), wa(w1, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wo(wif(w0, w1, w2), wa(w1, w2)), wif(w0, w1, w2))
-| wi(wa(w1, w2), wif(w0, w1, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wo(wif(w0, w1, w2), wa(w1, w2)), wif(w0, w1, w2))
-| wi(wif(w0, w1, w2), wo(wif(w0, w1, w2), wa(w1, w2)))
-| wi(wa(w1, w2), wif(w0, w1, w2))

|- wb(wo(wif(w0, w1, w2), wa(w1, w2)), wif(w0, w1, w2))
-| wi(wif(w0, w1, w2), wo(wif(w0, w1, w2), wa(w1, w2)))

body.origin: |- wi(wif(w0, w1, w2), wo(wif(w0, w1, w2), wa(w1, w2)))

cumulated.origin: |- wb(wo(wif(w0, w1, w2), wa(w1, w2)), wif(w0, w1, w2))

comment: Version of ~ consensus expressed using the conditional operator. (Remark: it may be better to express it as ~ consensus , using only binary connectives, and hinting at the fact that it is a Boolean algebra identity, like the absorption identities.) (Contributed by BJ, 30-Sep-2019.)
